name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Word to PDF Converter / Convert docx to PDF

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert your .docx documents to PDF quickly and easily within your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing "Word to PDF Converter / Convert docx to PDF", the Chrome extension that simplifies the process of converting Word documents to PDF. No more need for third-party software! This extension enables you to convert .docx files to PDF in just a few clicks. Perfect for professionals and students who need a fast and efficient way to convert documents. Note: This extension only supports .docx format files.
